Thanks so much for welcoming mina-san! hehe wellz my favorite
Shinsengumi would have to be either Okita or Saitou (for now) heh

them so far errr well the ones ive seen/read. (I've seen Rurouni
Kenshin, and read Kaze Hikaru and im wanting to see Peacemaker
Kurogane ><)

messages.subject: Re: hello!
messages.msgSnippet: ... know ... the ... Irrashaimase Yutaru-chan! Welcome to this wonderful mailing list. Not trying to lift our own bench here but I can assure you that if
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "yutaru" <lil_azn_kuni@h...> wrote:
> hello everyone! im new to this place and just wanted to let you
know
> so you won't think im a weird person or anything like that, im so
> glad that i found this place cause i really want learn more about
the
> Shinsengumi! hehe wellz i hope i get to know everyone!

Irrashaimase Yutaru-chan! Welcome to this wonderful mailing list.
Not trying to lift our own bench here but I can assure you that if
you're looking to learn more about the Shinsengumi, this is
the "English" place to be. Certainly there are Japanese sites out
there but I don't think any other "English" group can compare to
this one. Who is your favorite Shinsengumi? What is your favorite
Anime? Manga? Live-action? Hope to hear from you soon.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] hello!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hello and welcome! Yutaru is it? Well, I m one of the resident loudmouths on the list, so you ll be hearing from me quite often. As you ll not doubt notice
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/5/2004 9:39:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time, lil_azn_kuni@... writes:

> hello everyone! im new to this place and just wanted to let you know
> so you won't think im a weird person or anything like that, im so
> glad that i found this place cause i really want learn more
> about the
> Shinsengumi! hehe wellz i hope i get to know everyone!

Hello and welcome! Yutaru is it?

Well, I'm one of the resident loudmouths on the list, so you'll be hearing from me quite often. As you'll not doubt notice from going back through the messages, we really are obsessed with digging up the hard facts of these peoples' lives, so you'll be hearing quite a bit about them!

So is there anyone in the group in particular you were trying to find out more about? We'd be glad to fill you in on what we've discovered about them.

-MissBehavin

messages.subject: hello!
messages.msgSnippet: hello everyone! im new to this place and just wanted to let you know so you won t think im a weird person or anything like that, im so glad that i found this

hello everyone! im new to this place and just wanted to let you know
so you won't think im a weird person or anything like that, im so
glad that i found this place cause i really want learn more about the
Shinsengumi! hehe wellz i hope i get to know everyone!
